CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Admin_ID__c)), HYPERLINK( "https://admin.choco.com/"+IF(RecordType.Name = "Buyer", "buyers", "supplier")+"?search="&Admin_ID__c, "Open Admin Entity" ), HYPERLINK( "https://admin.choco.com/"+IF(RecordType.Name = "Buyer", "buyers", "supplier")+"?search="& Name, "Find Admin Id" ))
CustomField.label: Admin Entity Link
